word:
With the beginning of this work of publishing, we did not cease our labors in preaching the truth, but traveled from 
                                                                           89
place to place, proclaiming the doctrines which had brought so great light and joy to us, encouraging the believers, correcting errors, and setting things in order in the church. In order to carry forward the publishing enterprise, and at the same time continue our labors in different parts of the field, the paper was from time to time moved to different places.
